descriptionHtml:
Adds many different perks, and tweaks that allow you to practically fight any way you want.
Completely overhauls the one handed perk tree.
Adds in an unarmed perk tree, with the one handed skill.
Spiritual successor of www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72763
There may be some bugs, if you encounter any, please leave a comment asap, and I'll get to it

As always, appreciate the feedback.
Also, looking for testers,
add me on steam: steamcommunity.com/id/gateboy6
if you could help with that, or have something that needs my urgent attention, I suppose..

Sorry about the awkward placement of some of the perks, not my fault,
when so close, they sometimes bug out like that.

There are some typos, but they're small, and shouldn't be too bad. I apologize for this, however.
author: gateboy6
